Class FGProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.FGProject

  • public class FGProject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the global project settings.
    Author:
    Lukas Mentel

    • Method Detail

      • getCreateAllFiles

        public java.lang.Boolean getCreateAllFiles()
        Returns true if a separate file is created for each target language and each structure unit. If this is not the case, pieces of code of various languages, relating to the same structure level, should be bundled in a File. This option is disabled by default.
        Returns:
        Answer to the question above.
